CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1972 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1972 Code which are included herein. Sections of the 1972 Code, not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature.
